# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone-furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
-  Burner mining drill (position unknown) and a stone-furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found

### Electricity generator at position (106.5, -32.5)
Consists of 
-  Offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0) and steam-engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)
-  Pipe-group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and pipe-group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Transport system at position (63.5, -53.5)
Consists of 
-  Transport-belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport-belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)
-  Belt-group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities
-  Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them
-  Ensure that burner entities are connected to a power source

### Errors when using inserter entities
-  Ensure that inserter entities have source items before using them

### Errors when using offshore pump entities
-  Ensure that offshore pump entities are connected to a pipe-group

### Errors when using steam-engine entities
-  Ensure that steam-engine entities are connected to a boiler and a pipe-group

### Errors when using electricity-group entities
-  Ensure that electricity-group entities are plugged into an electric network

### Errors when using belt-group entities
-  Ensure that belt-group entities are connected to a transport-belt

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions or variables have been defined or invoked in the given execution logs.
